adala shri sannaspathra pradanothsawaya agramathya di.mu.jayarathna mathithumage pradhanathwayen kumbaiyangoda widyashekara piriwenedi ikuth 26 wana da pawathwini.shri්ra lanka ramanynya mahanikaye karaka sabhika dhurandarawa wada wisu mathale dhammissara maha swamin wahansege aacharya upadhyayathwayen 1944 di ampitiye siriwimala samanera himiyan lesa shri්ra jemsan wiwekashramayedi pawidi bimata pathwiya.kumbaiyangoda shri widyashekhara mulika piriwene mulika adhyapanaya hadariya. 1951 upasampada shilayata athulath wuha. 1951 di maradane shri්ra lanka widyalayata athulathwi 1956 bhashathrayenma ekawara rajakiya panditha upadhiya samathwuha.1956 di shri්ra lanka widyalayema acharyawarayeku lesa katayuthu kalaha.1957 di bemmulla bandara batawala shri widhyakara piriwene pradhanacharya washayenda katayuthu kalaha.1958 di udunuwara thelambaugala shri nigrodhakheththa piriwenehi upa pradhanacharya lesa pathwim laba pariwenadhipathi dhurayatada pathwi 1987 warshaya dakwa dashaka thunak pamana sewaya kalaha. 1964 di shri්ra lanka widyalankara wishwawidyalayen shasthrapathi upadhiya samath wu athara warsha wissakata adhika kalayak shri්ra lanka ramanynya maha nikaye jettanu wijjika washayen adhikarana katayuthuwala yedi atha.warsha dahayakata adhika kalayak upasampada winaya karmawaladi karmacharya swamin wahanse namak lesa katayuthu kirimada warsha pahalowakata adhika kalayak mahanuwara uthura pradeshiya sangha sabhawedi palaka thanathura darimada 1993 di jemsan wiwekashramaye wiharadhipathi dhurayata pathwi anga sampurna wiharasthanayak bawata pathkara ada jathyanthara bauddha bhawana madhyasthanayak bawata pathkara widesha ratawal rasaka wideshikayanta bauddha bhawana krama ha bauddha darshanaya pilibanda adhyanayak labadimata katayuthu kirimada sidu kere.nepala, bangaladesha lamun wisipahakata wadi pirisak pawidikara bauddha adhyapanaya labadimata katayuthu kara athi athara buruma rate bhawana krama pilibanda kramawath puhunuwak laba athi unwahanse indiyawa, nepalaya,thayilanthaya, singappuruwa, amarikawa yana wideshayanhi sancharaya karamin was wasa wada sitimin dharma pracharaka sewaye niyalemin wishala sewayak sidukara atha.nawaka samanera bhikshun sandaha galnawa shri්ra aanandaramaye sirisumiththa samanera aayathanaya aarambha kara atha.asuweni wiye pasuwana na himiyan me wana wita upasampada bhumiyata prawishta wi awurudu hata ekak sapire.itha chathura ha wichithra dharmadeshakayan wahanse namak lesa nirantharayen guwan widuliyen dharma deshana pawathwana athara sinhala bhashawa men ingi්rasi,pali, sanskrutha, drawida bhashawan hasirawime mana hakiyawak athi bhikshun wahanse namaki.unwahanse wisin liyana lada wikramorwashi wicharaya ha anuwadaya pali parichayada sanskarana thathwayen bihiwu mathale withthi nam shasthriya granthayada boho wicharakayange pasasumata lakwa atha.shasthrapathi adhyapanawedi winayacharya thalathuoye samiddhisiri himidi.si.

ihathada sa`dahan kara athi aakarayata janma patha්raya wimasa mangala yoga yedena kalathuladi ee piliba`dawa unanduwen katayuthu kirimen thama balaporoththu itu kara gatha hakiyi.esema ihathada sa`dahan karana lada aakarayata wiwahaya samibandha mulaka wana ga්rahayan wiwidha ayurin durwala thathwayata pamini awastha ath nami eි sadahada sudasu wath piliweth aadiyehi yedima yogya wana athara senasuru apala aadiyada wiwahaya pa්ramada kirima menma awasana awasthaewi wenas kirimi aadayada athi kala haki nisa ewani awasthawana yedenami ee sa`dahada sudasu aakaraye wath piliweth aadiyehi yedimada kala yuthuyi.

2017-2018 shri pada wandana waraya aarambha wi masayaka kalayak thula hatan margaya osse shri pada wandanawe pamini wandana karuwan saha nallathanniye awanhal walin his plastik wathura bothal thispandahasak parisarayata mudahara athi bawa ambaagamuwa pa්radeshiya sabhawe nallathanniya upa karyalaye sthanadhipathi ee.dabiliwi hemantha mahatha pawasiya.
